title: THURSDAY 1/21 - Bruce Arians not looking ahead
itunes:title: THURSDAY 1/21 - Bruce Arians not looking ahead
description:
Chiefs fans continue to monitor the health of Patrick Mahomes (0:20) as KC also gets some good news about their star running back (0:49). Tom Brady (1:40) knows a thing or two about comebacks, something Packers head coach Matt LaFleur has experienced first hand. Bucs head coach Bruce Arians (2:58) won't allow his team to look ahead to the Super Bowl, knowing it could cost them this weekend. The Lions name their next head coach (3:24) and Philip Rivers calls it a career (3:51)

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
